content:
norm_cast's behaviour has changed a lot in flt-regular, and I can't seem to find any PRs that mention this on the RSS from a quick ctrl+f - is this intended? some of the suggestions it makes are odd, too... for example:

â†‘âŸ¨x, hxâŸ© = (-1) ^ â†‘k * â†‘â†‘(zeta_unit' p) ^ m -> x = â†‘(int.neg_of_nat 1 ^ â†‘k) * â†‘â†‘(zeta_unit' p ^ m) (and the multiplications are compatible, so I'm not sure why it doesn't coalesce them together as before)
Inner one is units, second one is subalgebra (we're dealing with elements of ğ“(â„š(Î¶))Ë£ here)
